name: Bunwell
description:
Bunwell was made in 48 hours for the GMTK jam,

You crash land on an alien planet called, "earth", and must get back to your ship.

Click to move bunwell and drag to blow around grass.
You can bend grass over to climb on, or move it up to hide behind, use this to both platform and hide from enemies.
Be careful of "birds", they can't see through grass, but they might hear you...

If the game won't run, download the UE4PrereqSetup, (separated to save space)
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam/rate/158869
version 0.14 was made for the jam deadline,
version 0.15 has about 5 more minutes of work to make grass easier to stand back up.
